language.description: Components to send emails to users and contact admins

specs.title: Hide on main menu?
specs.description: If Yes, the link to the contact form will be hidden on the main menu.

specs.title: Only registered users can contact other users
specs.description: Enable this option if you want to avoid anonymous guests to send email to registered users.

specs.title: Enable CSRF protection for guests
specs.description:
When enabled, this option will set a hidden token in the contact form so automated submissions from spam bots are avoided.
Important: some proxys or Data Saving capabilities in some browsers may prevent authentic users to use the contact form. It is recommended to keep this option disabled unless you're constantly hit by spammy messages using the contact form.

specs.title: Allow everyone to email me
specs.description: By default, everyone can send emails to our users using the contact form without exposing email addresses. If you don't want to receive emails from everyone (except mods/admins), turn this setting off.

language.body:
Greetings, {$recipient_name}!

{$sender_name} has sent you a message using {$website_name}'s contact form:

{$body}

Feel free to reply as you usually do with your emails if you wish to directly reply to {$sender_email}.

Regards,
{$mailer_name} from {$website_name}.

Sent date: {$date}
Origin host: {$origin_host}
Origin location: {$origin_location}
Referer: {$referer}
